name: Dhergoloth
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.Magic Resistance: The dhergoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
traits.Magic Weapons: The dhergoloth's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.Multiattack: The dhergoloth makes two claw attacks.
actions.Claw: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d6 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage.
actions.Flailing Claws (Recharge 5xe2x80x936): The dhergoloth moves up to its walking speed in a straight line and targets each creature within 5 feet of it during its movement. Each target must succeed on a DC 14+1d6 + 11 Dexterity saving throw or take 22 (3d12 + 3) slashing damage.
actions.Teleport: The dhergoloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.
